org.spongepowered.api.entity.ai.task.builtin.creature

Interface AvoidEntityAITask

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AITask<Creature>

    public interface AvoidEntityAITask
extends AITask<Creature>

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AvoidEntityAITask.Builder 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AvoidEntityAITask.Builder builder()
      Creates a new AvoidEntityAITask.Builder for creating a new AvoidEntityAITask.
      double getCloseRangeSpeed()
      Gets the speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in close range.
      double getFarRangeSpeed()
      Gets the close range speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in a farther range than 7 blocks.
      float getSearchDistance()
      Gets the search distance at which any Entity instances in a radius of the parent Agent are considered for avoiding.
      Predicate<Entity> getTargetSelector()
      Gets the Predicate for filtering which Entity instances are qualified to have the owning Agent move away from the Entity of which the Predicate.test(Object) returns true.
      AvoidEntityAITask setCloseRangeSpeed(double speed)
      Sets the peed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in close range.
      AvoidEntityAITask setFarRangeSpeed(double speed)
      Sets the close range speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in a farther range than 7 blocks.
      AvoidEntityAITask setSearchDistance(float distance)
      Sets the search distance at which any Entity instances in a radius of the parent Agent are considered for avoiding.
      AvoidEntityAITask setTargetSelector(Predicate<Entity> predicate)
      Sets the Predicate for filtering which Entity instances are considered to be "avoided" by the owning Agent.

      • getTargetSelector

        Predicate<Entity> getTargetSelector()
        Gets the Predicate for filtering which Entity instances are qualified to have the owning Agent move away from the Entity of which the Predicate.test(Object) returns true.
        Returns:
        The predicate used to filter which entities to avoid

      • setTargetSelector

        AvoidEntityAITask setTargetSelector(Predicate<Entity> predicate)
        Sets the Predicate for filtering which Entity instances are considered to be "avoided" by the owning Agent.
        Parameters:
        predicate - The predicate
        Returns:
        This task, for chaining

      • getSearchDistance

        float getSearchDistance()
        Gets the search distance at which any Entity instances in a radius of the parent Agent are considered for avoiding.
        Returns:
        The search distance

        Returns:
        This task, for chaining

      • getCloseRangeSpeed

        double getCloseRangeSpeed()
        Gets the speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in close range. Close range is currently defined as 7 blocks.
        Returns:
        The close range movement speed modifier

      • setCloseRangeSpeed

        AvoidEntityAITask setCloseRangeSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the peed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in close range. Close range is currently defined as 7 blocks.
        Parameters:
        speed - The movement speed modifier
        Returns:
        This task, for chaining

      • getFarRangeSpeed

        double getFarRangeSpeed()
        Gets the close range speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in a farther range than 7 blocks.
        Returns:
        The close range speed

      • setFarRangeSpeed

        AvoidEntityAITask setFarRangeSpeed(double speed)
        Sets the close range speed "modifier" for which the parent Agent will move away from a found Entity to "avoid" when in a farther range than 7 blocks.

        Returns:
        This task, for chaining
